mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO work_experience ( emp_id, start_date, end_date, company_name, job_title, create_time, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES
( #{workExperience.empId}, #{workExperience.startDate}, #{workExperience.endDate}, #{workExperience.companyName}, #{workExperience.jobTitle}, #{workExperience.createTime}, #{workExperience.updateTime}, #{workExperience.isDeleted} )
